meanings.definition: Adapted to live together in harmony.
meanings.sent1: The plants in the garden were coadapted to thrive in the same soil.
meanings.sent2: The coadapted birds sang in perfect unison, creating a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent3: The coadapted squirrels shared the same treehouse, living in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: Their coadapted personalities meshed together like puzzle pieces, creating a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The coadapted colors of the painting blended seamlessly, creating a stunning masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Developed in a way that complements each other.
meanings.sent1: The coadapted tools fit perfectly in the toolbox, each serving a unique purpose.
meanings.sent2: Their coadapted skills combined to solve the problem efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The coadapted flavors of the dish complemented each other, creating a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: Their coadapted schedules synced perfectly, allowing for smooth coordination.
meanings.sent5: The coadapted melodies intertwined beautifully, creating a harmonious composition.

meanings.definition: Mutually adjusted for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The coadapted gears in the machine worked together flawlessly.
meanings.sent2: Their coadapted strategies ensured success in their mission.
meanings.sent3: The coadapted tools in the workshop made the work easier and more efficient.
meanings.sent4: Their coadapted movements on the dance floor were synchronized and graceful.
meanings.sent5: The coadapted parts of the puzzle fit together perfectly, revealing the complete picture.
